analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed cing / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /

analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: or the fruit of an arhat, or the attainment of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: zhes zer na /
analyzed: zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, that also will be an incomplete collection for writing out, expounding, teaching, and meditating on this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, those also should be known by bodhisattva great beings as the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'chad pa dang / bsgom pa'i bar du byed pa na gang dag bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'chad pa dang / bsgom pa'i bar du byed pa na gang dag bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when this deep perfection of wisdom is being written out, and when it is being expounded, and when it is being meditated on, many works of Māra that will create obstacles will occur.

original: byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi las de dag rig par bya zhing //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi las de dag rig par bya zhing //
translated: The bodhisattvas should know those works of Māra.

original: rig nas kyang rnam par spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rig nas kyang rnam par spang bar bya'o //
translated: And having known them, they should be abandoned.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhuti: What are the deeds of Mara which the Bodhisattva, the great being, should know and avoid?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las gang dag rig par bgyi zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las gang dag rig par bgyi zhing /
translated: The Lord: The deeds of Mara which the Bodhisattva, the great being, should know and avoid are:🔽the counterfeit perfection of wisdom, the counterfeit perfection of concentration, vigour, patience, morality, and giving.

original: rig nas kyang rnam par spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rig nas kyang rnam par spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Subhuti: What is the counterfeit perfection of wisdom?🔽The Lord: Here the Bodhisattva, the great being, coursing in the perfection of wisdom, does not fully know the four applications of mindfulness, etc. to: the Buddhadharmas, and does not fully know the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the counterfeit perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson @186a *//🔽'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson @186a *// 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag 'byung bar 'gyur te / de dag ni /
translated: And so for the counterfeit perfection of concentration, vigour, patience, morality, and giving.

original: byang chub sems dpas rig nas rnam par spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas rig nas rnam par spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: These are the deeds of Mara which the Bodhisattva, the great being, should know and avoid.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ltar bcos pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ltar bcos pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, there will be the arising of the works of Māra that are imitations of the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to and the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi las dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: There will be the arising of the works of Māra that are associated with the Śrāvakayāna and the Pratyeka­buddha­yāna.

original: byang chub sems dpas de dag kyang rig nas rnam par spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas de dag kyang rig nas rnam par spang bar bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva should recognize them and reject them.

original: 'di skad kyang smra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad kyang smra bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will say,

original: khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag sgoms shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag sgoms shig /
translated: ‘You should cultivate these four applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam yang sgoms shig /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam yang sgoms shig /
translated: You should cultivate the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang sgoms shig /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang sgoms shig /
translated: Meditate on the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: de dag kun chub par gyis shig /
analyzed: de dag kun chub par gyis shig /
translated: Master them.

original: de dag kun chub par byas nas kyang 'di nyid la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: de dag kun chub par byas nas kyang 'di nyid la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /
translated: Having mastered them, attain the fruit of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /
translated: Attain the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, and the state of an arhat.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par @186b sangs rgyas pas kyang khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par @186b sangs rgyas pas kyang khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer na /
translated: What will you do with unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhuti, this is also a sign that the profound perfection of wisdom will not be written out, will not be taken up, will not be demonstrated, will not be studied, will not be properly paid attention to, up to will not be fully realized.

original: bdud sdig can bdud kyi las 'di lta bu 'di dag nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud sdig can bdud kyi las 'di lta bu 'di dag nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, this is also a deed of Māra, the evil one, that is, the non-completion of writing out, taking up, teaching, explaining, mastering, properly paying attention to, and meditating on this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad dang / lus gser gyi mdog lta bu 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par bsgyur te 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de mthong nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad dang / lus gser gyi mdog lta bu 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par bsgyur te 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de mthong nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, Māra the evil one, having transformed into the appearance of a buddha, with a body the color of gold, and endowed with a fathom-wide aura, will come and the bodhisattvas will see him and feel joy.

original: de dag dga' ba skyes na /
analyzed: de dag dga' ba skyes na /
translated: When they feel joy,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this also should be known by bodhisattva great beings as the work of Māra.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @187a *//

analyzed: rgyas 'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya'o //

analyzed: byang chub yod pa ma yin te /

analyzed: gang la byang chub yod pa ma yin pa de la ni /

translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when sons and daughters of good family write out, read aloud, clearly articulate, memorize, and properly pay attention to this perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
